Digital Media | Web Taster

Web Taster

Code a simple website

  1. Introduction

    Understand how web sites are put together and the different languages involved.
  2. Coding Content

    Learn how we use HTML code to represent content in web pages.
  3. Styley Design

    Use CSS to add some design flair to your web page.
  4. Tidy Layouts

    Tidy up the layout of your web page using a combination of HTML and CSS knowledge.
